paper_metadata.title: Methodologies for evaluating women's empowerment in poverty alleviation programmes: illustrations from Paraguay and Honduras

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: It is frequently emphasised that the key to women's empowerment is to increase their self-reliance by bolstering their capacity to make choices, to gain confidence through self-determination, and to exercise control over both material and non-material resources
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: This chapter has talked about the need to measure empowerment, and discussed an Empowerment Evaluation Model (EEM)

bonus_information.qualitative_evidence_citation: By evaluating the discourses of project clients in a 'bottom-up' way, it is possible to derive indicators which are meaningful to women themselves and which document something of the process of empowerment

evidence_citations.target_population_citation: women's empowerment in poverty alleviation programmes
